name: test5
description:
Company is seeking a Data Analytics intern with data manipulation and analytical skills to assist the company in decision-making.
In this role individuals are likely to collect, verify, and conduct descriptive analyses on data.
In addition, individuals may be asked to recommend business process changes, develop reports and/or presentations, and build standard reporting dashboards for common visualizations.

Responsibilities may include:
  • Using data science techniques to collect, process, and analyze alternative data sets.
  • Developing knowledge and insights from large and/or unstructured data sets.
  • Developing and validating models, views, and visualizations to allow your data to tell its story.
  • Iterating on existing models and visualizations to dive deeper and answer ever more complex questions.
  • Generating descriptive reports without supervision using common visual and numeric data summaries.
  • Learning pertinent software for data manipulation or statistical analyses.

Requirements:
  • Detail oriented with strong organizational skills.
  • Must have excellent excel skills.
  • Ability to design clear and concise visualizations.
  • Strong interpersonal/team work skills.
  • Ability to multi-task and meet tight deadlines.
